welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Juprelle, Belgium! Prepare to be charmed by our quaint town and its picturesque landscapes. From our delicious cuisine to our rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Juprelle has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Liege Airport, primarily used for cargo and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aachen/Merzbruck Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
